name: The Mazes That Move
description:
How To Play:

Use the arrow keys or the WASD keys to move the maze.

This game features two levels. In each level, the player must move the maze to make the red ball go into the goal. In the first level, the player tilts the maze to make the red ball go into the goal in the level. In the second level, the player translates the maze up and down to make the red ball go into the goal in the level.

This game was made by:

D-Studios ( Devang Bhatnagar),

digitamo,

and   Twist (Joseph Nyamadi) @iamTwist

This is our submission to the Game Maker's Toolkit Jam 2018.

The theme for this game jam was:

This game was made in under 48 hours. This game was made in 2018 during the weekend of August 31-September 2.
